headline: Is Intel’s EMIB Outsourcing Deepening Amkor Technology’s (AMKR) Strategic Role In Advanced Chip Packaging?
summary: Recently, reports indicated that Intel outsourced its high-end EMIB chip packaging to Amkor Technology for the first time, using Amkor’s advanced facility in South Korea. This move highlights Amkor’s expanding role in next-generation semiconductor packaging and testing, as chipmakers increasingly seek external partners for complex manufacturing steps. We’ll now examine how Intel’s decision to entrust advanced EMIB packaging to Amkor could influence the company’s broader investment...
